\documentclass[border=3pt]{standalone}
\usepackage{tikz}
\usepackage{pgfplots}
\pgfplotsset{compat=1.17}
\usetikzlibrary{external}
\tikzexternalize[prefix=img/] % activate
\newcommand{\inputtikz}[1]{
  \tikzsetnextfilename{#1}
  \input{img/#1.pgf}
}
\begin{document}
%   \inputtikz{fig01}
  \inputtikz{fig02}
\end{document}
